short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate QR code from selected text. No need to manually close the popup window, it will automatically close after 15 seconds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate QR code from selected text in 3 simple steps:

1. Select a text
2. Right-click on the selected text
3. Select "Generate QR Code" from the context menu

There's no need to manually close the popup window, It will automatically close after 15 seconds.

This extension is using QRious library to generate barcodes under GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation and the ownership belongs to its respective developers.
